```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

library(doMC)
registerDoMC(cores=detectCores())
library(stringr)
library(SentimentAnalysis)
library(searchable)
```

```{r}
buzzfeed <- read.csv("https://www.macalester.edu/~ajohns24/data/buzzfeed.csv")
```

```{r}
buzzfeed2 <- buzzfeed %>%
  mutate(text = as.character(text)) %>%
  mutate(title = as.character(title))
```

```{r}
buzzfeed2$text  <- gsub("[^0-9A-Za-z/// ]","<>" , buzzfeed2$text ,ignore.case = TRUE)
buzzfeed2$text <- gsub("<>","" , buzzfeed2$text ,ignore.case = TRUE)


buzzfeed2$title  <- gsub("[^0-9A-Za-z/// ]","<>" , buzzfeed2$title ,ignore.case = TRUE)
buzzfeed2$title <- gsub("<>","" , buzzfeed2$title ,ignore.case = TRUE)
```


```{r}
sentiment <- analyzeSentiment(buzzfeed2$text)


buzzfeed2%>%
  cbind(sentiment) -> buzzfeed2 #this includes all the sentiment columns, may not need all of them though

```

```{r}
buzzfeed3 <- buzzfeed2 %>%
  mutate(text = as.character(text)) %>%
  mutate(text = strsplit(text, "\\s+")) %>%
  mutate(title = as.character(title)) %>%
  mutate(title = strsplit(title, "\\s+"))
```

```{r}
buzzfeed_final_ish <- buzzfeed3 %>%
  mutate(text_length = lengths(text)) %>%
  mutate(title_length = lengths(title)) %>%
  select(title, text, authors, source,type,WordCount,text_length,title_length,SentimentGI,NegativityGI, PositivityGI) # wordCount is unique words, text_length is total words.
```

```{r}
has_trump <- rep(NA, 182)

for (i in 1:182){
  has_trump[i] <- sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("Trump"))
}

buzzfeed_final_ish <- cbind(buzzfeed_final_ish,has_trump) 

buzzfeed_final_ish <- buzzfeed_final_ish %>%
  mutate(has_trump = has_trump/title_length)
```

```{r}
has_politics <- rep(NA, 182)

for (i in 1:182){
  has_politics[i] <- sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("Trump")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("Hillary")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("clinton"))+ sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("democratic")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("republican")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("democratics")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("republicans")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("politics")) + sum(buzzfeed_final_ish$title[[i]] == ignore.case("political")) 
}

buzzfeed_final_ish <- cbind(buzzfeed_final_ish,has_politics) 

buzzfeed_final_ish <- buzzfeed_final_ish %>%
  mutate(has_politics = has_politics/title_length)
```
